author: Home Repair Tutor
description: PEX A shower valve tips…I used PEX A for this shower valve and the most important first step was making square cuts. That keeps the tubing flush against the sleeves and fittings. I make 5 to 6 expansions for 1/2 inch PEX A and immediately make my connections. Many thanks to SharkBite for sponsoring this video 🔥#plumbing #pex #sharkbite #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: PEX A Shower Valve Tips - #shorts #plumbing #sharkbite #brandpartner
